thread.title: Head To Head: Arkansas vs. Alabama preview and prediction
thread.title_full: Head To Head: Arkansas vs. Alabama preview and prediction | AL.com

author: Justin King | jking@al.com
title: Head To Head: Arkansas vs. Alabama preview and prediction
text:
Let's come right out and say it: Alabama looked strong in all three phases of the game against Georgia. The Tide went into a hostile environment, in bad weather, and smashed the Bulldogs to the tune of 38-10.
Now, the Tide are back in the friendly confines of Bryant-Denny for a match-up against a 2-3 team who lost to Toledo.
Doesn't sound too threatening, right?
Think again, because this isn't your average ( er ... below average ... ) 2-3 team. This is an Arkansas team who held Alabama to 223 yards of total offense in 2014, when the Tide barely managed to escape with a win.
The Crimson Tide's 2015 homecoming game has all the makings of a trap ... so will the Tide rise above the challenge and prevail? Find out what our experts think by watching the video above.
Season Stats:
Another week has gone by and Annice still finds herself in 1st place ... but a new challenger has risen. Alabama beat reporter Michael Casagrande is now tied with Annice, both holding an overall record of 55-20.
Kevin, meanwhile, is steadily climbing. While Mr. Scarbinsky is still a few games behind with a record of 51-24, he is now tied for 2nd place.
Here's a full breakdown of the standings:
Annice Deweese 55-20 Michael Casagrande 55-20 Kevin Scarbinsky 51-24 Brandon Marcello 51-24 Matt Scalici 50-25 James Crepea
49-26 Matt Zenitz 49-26 John Talty 46-29 Wesley Sinor 46-29 Joseph Goodman 40-35 Here are the rest of Kevin and Annice's week 6 picks:
